extension.name: System - Natural Package
extension.author: Ben Griffin
extension.description: 'Natural' enables xpath-enabled natural view management. The package includes the following bits of kit. lib. natural - which includes the basic xpath functions. plg. natural - which overrides the core classes to support xpaths/composite. plg. ace - syntax highlighting editor mod. natural - which provides a simple MV module environment. com. composite - which provides composite articles.
